bs-deferred-action-status-pending:
Value of a cell in an overview table that tells that a particular action has not started yet
{{Identical|Pending}}
bs-deferred-action-status-running:
Value of a cell in an overview table that tells that a particular action has started
{{Identical|Running}}
bs-deferred-action-status-done:
Value of a cell in an overview table that tells that a particular action has been completed without errors
{{Identical|Done}}
bs-deferred-action-status-error:
Value of a cell in an overview table that tells that a particular action has failed during execution
{{Identical|Failed}}
bs-deferred-action-apicopypage-descripti:
Description of an action that copies the content of a page to another one.

Parameters:
* $1 - The source page title to be copied from
* $2 - The target page title to be copied to
bs-deferred-action-apieditpage-descripti:
Description of an action that edits the contents of a page.

Parameters:
* $1 - The title of the page that will be edited
{{Identical|Edit}}
bs-deferred-batch-title: Title of a dialog or panel that shows a list of actions to be processed
bs-deferred-batch-progress-desc:
Title of a fieldset that displays the progress of the running batch process
{{Identical|Progress}}
bs-deferred-batch-actions:
Title of the column that shows the names of the actions on the batch
{{Identical|Action}}
bs-deferred-batch-description:
Title of the column that shows a short description of the actions on the batch
{{Identical|Description}}
bs-deferred-batch-status:
Title of the column that shows the current state of the actions on the batch
{{Identical|Status}}
bs-deferred-action-apiaddcategories-desc:
Description of an action that adds a set of categories to existing set of categories on a page.

Parameters:
* $1 - The page title that is being modified
bs-deferred-action-apiremovecategories-d:
Description of an action that removes a set of categories  to a page.

Parameters:
* $1 - The page title that is being modified
bs-deferred-action-apisetcategories-desc:
Description of an action that adds a set of categories  to a page with removing existing ones.

Parameters:
* $1 - The page title that is being modified
bs-deferred-action-apimovepage-descripti:
Description of an action that moves a page.

Parameters:
* $1 - The source page title to be moved from
* $2 - The target page title to be moved to
bs-deferred-action-apideletepage-descrip:
Description of an action that deletes a page.

Parameters:
* $1 - The page title to be deleted
{{Identical|Delete}}
